data.title: Zach Randolph named to Western Conference All-Star team
data.meta_description: MEMPHIS, January 28, 2010 – The NBA announced tonight that Memphis Grizzlies forward Zach Randolph has been named to the Western Conference All-Star team as a reserve, marking his first NBA All-Star selection. The 2010 All-Star Game will take place Sunday, Feb. 14 in Dallas. “I’m really happy right now because I put a lot of work in this summer and it paid off,” Randolph said. “I want to thank the fans, the organization, my coaches and especially my teammates. I also want to thank the city of Memphis for supporting me.”
